name: Fidget: Pop It & Simple Dimple
description:
In Fidget: Pop It & Simple Dimple you will find the best anti-stress games for anxiety relief. Some of our fidget toys: pop it, simple dimple, bubble wrap, slime and etc.

The collection of Antistress Games Fidget Pop It & Simple Dimple includes:
- Pop it. Pop the bubbles in the pop it toys. Pop it make satisfying sound.
- Slime simulator. Slime has a unique texture and ASMR sound.
- Simple Dimple. Pop the simple dimple balls over and over again!
- Antistress toys. Stretch the anti-stress toys in different directions.
- Spinner. Spins at maximum speeds!
- Bubble wrap. Favorite anti-stress since childhood!

This is the perfect stress reliever game. Play with colorful antistress pop it for relaxing. Play with realistic slime for satisfying. Play with simple dimple for really fun!
